quest.name: With Tired Hands We Toil
journal: Alphinaud is ready to lead the way to Radiata.
objectives: Stay alert for imperial soldiers on the way to Specula Imperatoris.
Enter Specula Imperatoris and stay alert for imperial soldiers.
Stay alert for imperial soldiers on the way to Radiata.

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: Hm! I knew the Alliance had spies in Gyr Abania, but in Radiata? Impressive...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...I suspect a handpicked contingent of the Ala Mhigan Brigade's finest would have been equally, if not more, qualified...but what do I know.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Perhaps you recall the night we first met outside the Sil'dihn ruins, under such unfortunate circumstances? I had just returned from a meeting with my Ala Mhigan agents. As I said before, we have been preparing for this day.

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text: We have lost so many men already... If we suffer another defeat like that, this campaign is over.

dialogue.name: STORMOFFICER
dialogue.text: We will have our retribution. It is but a matter of time.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Had Alphinaud not volunteered you, I would have asked. If anyone can see this mission through, it's you.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: We'll be fighting with the main host when the time comes to attack Castrum Abania. I swear by everything that is holy─we won't lose!

dialogue.name: VMAHTIA
dialogue.text: There you go again, getting all worked up...though it could be worse. So long as you don't start saying bollocks like, “I'll never forgive them!” Makes for a terrible battle cry, you know?

dialogue.name: JMOLDVA
dialogue.text: Many of the J tribe call this place home. I shudder to think what would become of them if we fail.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Thanks for standing by me, Forename. Together, we'll make Conrad proud!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So, to review: we are to travel to Radiata, where we will meet with a contact recruited by Marshal Tarupin's agents.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I took the liberty of reviewing intelligence reports while Forename and Lyse were away, so the settlement is not wholly unfamiliar to me...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: As the vice marshal indicated, the vast majority of the populace is employed as menial labor in either Specula Imperatoris or Castrum Abania. Perhaps as a result of this, the Resistance has long struggled to make inroads there.

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: Aye, you have the right of it. They got a better deal than most Ala Mhigans─feeding off what scraps the imperials gave 'em. Damned if I know how Marshal Tarupin's agents got one of them to turn his coat.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I understand your disdain, I do. But I also understand their desire to look after their families by any means necessary...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Our contact is a Roegadyn woman. She will ask us a question. After we answer with “courage,” she will know us as friends.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text:
"Courage.“ Right.
Put together a squadron, Naago. We'll need them soon.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: With me, my friends─and be ready for anything.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Keep an eye out, would you? Something doesn't feel right...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I know you're out there...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If there were magitek armor nearby, surely we would have heard them by now?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: See? What did I tell you? Let us continue on to Specula Imperatoris!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Savages!?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Whew. That would have been an unceremonious ending to our tale.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Heh, nothing to it!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Of course there were still soldiers lurking about... Fortunately, they were no match for Lyse. Come─Radiata is not much further.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Of course, in light of our recent encounter, it would be prudent to proceed with caution and remain vigilant for imperial forces...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I thought they said this was a village? It looks more like a work camp...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Nary a soldier in sight. Mayhap they were recalled to Castrum Abania...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Looks like it's safe to enter. I don't see any imperials...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Hmm... I don't see smoke above Castrum Abania anymore. Do you think they fixed the cannon already...?
